document.full_text: thirty-two musk oxen were found dead in the ice along the bering strait, apparently killed when they drowned in water that surged ashore during a winter storm, the national park service said on tuesday.
document.title: dozens of musk oxen found dead near bering strait
lines_and_colors: thirty-two musk oxen were found dead in the ice along the bering strait, apparently killed when they drowned in water that surged ashore during a winter storm, the national park service said on tuesday.
